        public boolean setDBConfig(java.lang.String propertiesPath)
        Parameters:
        propertiesPath -
        Returns:
        Returns true if database was configured correctly or false otherwise. Configures database connection through a properties file.

      • setDBConfig

        public boolean setDBConfig(DBConfig config)
        Parameters:
        config -
        Returns:
        Returns true if database was configured correctly or false otherwise. Configures database connection through a bean.

      • persistRepository

        public void persistRepository(Repository repository,
                     java.util.List<MetricUid> metrics)
        Parameters:
        repository -
        metrics - Analyzes and persists repository information in database and defines what metrics will be calculated for each repository state. Set "metrics" as null if you don't want to calculate any metric.

      • refreshRepository

        public void refreshRepository(java.lang.String repositoryPath,
                     java.util.List<MetricUid> metrics)
        Parameters:
        repositoryPath -
        metrics - Analyzes and persists new repository informations in database and defines what metrics will be calculated only for new repository states. Set "metrics" as null if you don't want to calculate any metric.

      • calculateMetrics

        public void calculateMetrics(java.lang.String repositoryPath,
                    java.util.List<MetricUid> metrics)
        Parameters:
        repositoryPath -
        metrics - Does not analyze the repository, only calculates a list of metrics from beginning of the repository.

                            java.lang.String repositoryPath)
        Parameters:
        login -
        password -
        repositoryPath - Synchronizes local repository with web-based repository service.
